00086 inline i2d::CVector2d CScreenTransform::GetClientPosition(istd::CIndex2d position) const
00087 {
00088        i2d::CVector2d result;
00089        i2d::CVector2d pos(position.GetX(), position.GetY());

00092 
00093        return result;
00094 }

00097 inline istd::CIndex2d CScreenTransform::GetScreenPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& position) const
00098 {
00099        i2d::CVector2d result;
00100        GetApply(position, result);
00101 
00102        return istd::CIndex2d(int(result.GetX()), int(result.GetY()));
00103 }
